fullText:
Untiring Virtue

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, paladin; ardent vow, call of virtue, or lay on hands power
Benefit: Whenever you reach a milestone, you gain one additional use of your ardent vow, call of virtue, or lay on hands for today.

Published in Divine Power, page(s) 140.
name: Untiring Virtue
